MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL36 Talyllyn area of Tywyn. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 5:24am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:10am on 9th March 2021.
